dcterms:creator: C. Gicquel
M. Minoux
Y. Dallery
dcterms:description: A comprehensive literature review on capacitated lot sizing models, discussing various approaches and methodologies.
dcterms:title: Capacitated Lot Sizing Problem (CLSP)

dcterms:creator: İ. E. Büyüktahkın
N. Liu
dcterms:description: Dynamic programming approximation algorithms for the capacitated lot-sizing problem, providing benchmark instances for testing.
dcterms:title: Benchmark CLSP instances

dcterms:creator: A. Atamtürk
J. C. Muñoz
dcterms:description: Instances of the capacitated lot sizing problem generated based on capacity-to-demand ratios, used for testing optimization algorithms.
dcterms:title: CLSP instances generated from capacity-to-demand ratios

dcterms:creator: J. C. Hartman
İ. E. Büyüktahkın
J. C. Smith
dcterms:description: Instances of the capacitated lot sizing problem that incorporate time-varying capacity, useful for evaluating dynamic programming approaches.
dcterms:title: CLSP instances with time-varying capacity

dcterms:creator: D. Bertsimas
B. Stellato
dcterms:description: Instances of the capacitated lot sizing problem with various characteristics, aimed at exploring online mixed-integer optimization.
dcterms:title: CLSP instances with different characteristics

dcterms:creator: M. Florian
J. K. Lenstra
A. Rinnooy Kan
dcterms:description: Instances of the capacitated lot sizing problem with varying planning horizons, used to assess the performance of optimization algorithms.
dcterms:title: CLSP instances with varying planning horizons
